title: What Particle Are You?
description: Are you a fast-moving photon, an introverted neutrino, or a drama-filled Higgs boson? Take this test and uncover your subatomic alter ego! ‚öõÔ∏è‚ú®

options.text: Just run away at light speed
Try to meditate and keep everyone together
Stand my ground and exert my force
The ability to disappear at will

questions.question: What's your vibe in group projects?

options.text: I literally hold the group together
I do my own thing and barely interact
I oversee everything but don't get involved

questions.question: Your friends would describe you as...

photon.description: You're a ‚ú® PHOTON ‚ú® ‚Äî fast, fabulous, and literally unstoppable.
photon.quote: You light up every room you enter. Mostly because you ARE the light.

electron.description: You're an üåÄ ELECTRON ‚Äî introverted, energetic, and occasionally chaotic.
electron.quote: You orbit everything‚Ä¶ but never stay still.

neutrino.description: You're a üëª NEUTRINO ‚Äî mysterious, barely interactive, but constantly moving.
neutrino.quote: People barely notice you, but you're always around.

gluon.description: You're a üîó GLUON ‚Äî the clingy friend, holding everyone together whether they like it or not.

proton.description: You're a üí™ PROTON ‚Äî strong, stable, and a natural leader.
proton.quote: You basically define the universe. No big deal.

higgs.description: You're a üåü HIGGS BOSON ‚Äî glamorous, rare, and fundamentally important.
higgs.quote: You give meaning (and mass) to everything around you.

graviton.description: You're a üåå GRAVITON ‚Äî powerful but theoretical, a true enigma.
graviton.quote: Are you real? Scientists are still debating that.
